name: ChamPDF CLA
text: Thank you for your contribution to ChamPDF!
By signing this CLA, you agree to the terms of our Contributor License Agreement.
**Individual Contributors**: Please review and sign our [Individual CLA (ICLA)](ICLA.md)
**Corporate Contributors**: If you are contributing on behalf of your employer, please have your organization sign our [Corporate CLA (CCLA)](CCLA.md) by contacting deep@championsmail.com

notes.purpose: This CLA enables ChamPDF's dual licensing model (AGPL-3.0 + commercial license)
